long_description: Warmly insulated with Polartec(R) Alpha(R), the women's Strata Vest from Rab protects your core on active adventures in cold, dry weather. Pertex(R) Microlight shell is very lightweight yet windproof; soft and durable, too. Polartec Alpha 80g insulation delivers lightweight warmth and breathability; it's also highly stable, so that mesh and open-weave fabrics can be used as backings. Extra insulation is placed where you need it most, such as the front core. Polyester-mesh and woven-nylon panels on the inside enhance breathabiltiy. Chin guard at neck protects sensitive skin from chafing. Zippered hand pockets are concealed in the side seams. Zippered internal chest pocket doubles as a stuff sack. Hem drawcord helps seal weather out, warmth in. The women's Rab Strata Vest features a slim fit.
short_description: Warmly insulated with Polartec(R) Alpha(R), the women's Strata Vest from Rab protects your core on active adventures in cold, dry weather.
